Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: More than 60,000 votes were initially cast for both candidates
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: Participants in the June 18 Republican primary for the Fifth Congressional District

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Folks in the 5th District can rest assured that should they elect me in November, they will have an effective fighter in Congress who will get the job done.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: Constituents of the 5th District, referenced by John McGuire

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: Thousands who volunteered, contributed, prayed, and supported my re-election campaign.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: Volunteers and supporters of Bob Good's re-election campaign

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Under Virginia law, localities relative to this election are required to cover the cost of a recount when the margin of error is at or below.5 percent.
Document Sources.Source Justification: Relevant legislation governing election recounts in Virginia

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: This recount reaffirmed what we already knew from the June 18th primary. It really is amazing what we can achieve when we work as a team....
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Winner of the June 18 Republican primary for the Fifth Congressional District

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: We have secure and fair elections in Virginia, and Virginians can have confidence in the final results of this race.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Commenting on the integrity of the recount process in Virginia

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: I want to thank the more than 31,000 voters of the 5th District who voted for me in the June 18 primary, and the thousands who volunteered, contributed, prayed, and supported my re-election campaign.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: Congressman (R-Farmville), Chair for the House Freedom Caucus
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: Incumbent Representative for Virginia’s 5th District, commenting on the primary outcome
